name: Touch Down Football Solitaire
description:
Draft Day is on! Ready for a round of football Solitaire?
Do you love football? Are you a master of Solitaire? Are you up for an adventure? Join the Solitaire City Juggernauts for the upcoming football championship and let the world know that you are more than a simple rookie! Master numerous levels of Solitaire, follow Frank and his fun story about the world of football and become the next champion!

  • Loads of Solitaire levels for young and old
  • Fun characters and a hilarious story
  • Awesome minigames for even more game fun
